prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a vibrant yellow and black color scheme.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a humanoid with striking zigzag patterns on its body.
Generate a creature that embodies speed and agility, perfect for electric attacks.
Make a bipedal Pokemon with spiky features and a mischievous smile.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique blend of bright colors and powerful electric abilities.
Design an energetic Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and uses electric moves.
Show me a Pokemon that has a strong connection to electricity and a playful personality.
